Parameter.Label: Full close time
Parameter.Help: Time to go from opened to closed state. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close.

Parameter.Label: Full open time
Parameter.Help: Time to go from closed to open state. This value may diff er from full close time for some blinds due to gravity. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close.
